fields.comment: Current state of ai, defines what the animal is doing
fields.name: ai_state

fields.comment: If not 0, then we wait till this frame to pop current state from our state stack
fields.name: ai_state_timer

fields.comment: if 1, will ensure state timer keeps current state alive for a while when Component is Enabled
fields.name: keep_state_alive_when_enabled

fields.comment: We always do this job, unless interrupted (i.e. by taking fire damage)
fields.name: preferred_job

fields.comment: the chance of escaping if someone damages us. only works if 'can_fly = 0 '
fields.name: escape_if_damaged_probability

fields.comment: the chance of counter-attacking if someone damages us, and we didn't escape
fields.name: attack_if_damaged_probability

fields.comment: We cast rays from our position + eye_offset to check if we can see something
fields.name: eye_offset_x

fields.comment: We cast rays from our position + eye_offset to check if we can see something
fields.name: eye_offset_y

fields.comment: If 1, we never attack anyone unless attacked before by someone
fields.name: attack_only_if_attacked

fields.comment: If 1, we don't attack members of our herd even if they accidentally attack us
fields.name: dont_counter_attack_own_herd

fields.comment: When looking for threats/prey this is the max distance from us on the X axis we scan
fields.name: creature_detection_range_x

fields.comment: When looking for threats/prey this is the max distance from us on the Y axis we scan
fields.name: creature_detection_range_y

fields.comment: When looking for threats/prey this is our field of view around the X axis. 90 means we scan the whole 180 degrees around the X axis, to the left and right
fields.name: creature_detection_angular_range_deg

fields.comment: Checks for threats/prey take place at least this many frames apart from each other
fields.name: creature_detection_check_every_x_frames

fields.comment: JobDefault idles before we've been once at least this close to the camera
fields.name: max_distance_to_cam_to_start_hunting

fields.comment: The maximum depth (in nodes) path search use when we have not found prey yet
fields.name: pathfinding_max_depth_no_target

fields.comment: The maximum depth (in nodes) path search use when we have found prey
fields.name: pathfinding_max_depth_has_target

fields.comment: what's the initial random aggressiveness of this creature
fields.name: aggressiveness_min

fields.comment: what's the initial random aggressiveness of this creature
fields.name: aggressiveness_max

fields.comment: if 1, the AI tries to attack whoever it considers a friend based on herd_ids, CHARMED and BERSERK status etc. useful e.g. for healers.
fields.name: tries_to_ranged_attack_friends

fields.comment: If 1, and melee attack has been configured, we can perform melee attacks
fields.name: attack_melee_enabled

fields.comment: If 1, and dash attack has been configured, we can perform dash attacks (a long-distance melee attack where we dash towards the enemy)
fields.name: attack_dash_enabled

fields.comment: If 1, and ranged attack has been configured, we can perform ranged attacks
fields.name: attack_landing_ranged_enabled

fields.comment: If 1, and ranged attack has been configured, we can perform ranged attacks
fields.name: attack_ranged_enabled

fields.comment: If not 0, melee and dash attacks cause knockback to target
fields.name: attack_knockback_multiplier

fields.comment: If 1, we can only attack in one fixed direction
fields.name: is_static_turret

fields.comment: Maximum distance at which we can perform a melee attack
fields.name: attack_melee_max_distance

fields.comment: The animation frame during which the melee attack damage is inflicted and visual effects are created
fields.name: attack_melee_action_frame

fields.comment: The minimum number of frames we wait between melee attacks
fields.name: attack_melee_frames_between

fields.comment: Melee attack damage inclusive minimum amount. The damage is randomized between melee attack_damage_min and attack_melee_damage_max
fields.name: attack_melee_damage_min

fields.comment: Melee attack damage inclusive maximum amount. The damage is randomized between melee attack_damage_min and attack_melee_damage_max
fields.name: attack_melee_damage_max

fields.comment: The x component of the impulse that is applied to damaged entities
fields.name: attack_melee_impulse_vector_x

fields.comment: The y component of the impulse that is applied to damaged entities
fields.name: attack_melee_impulse_vector_y

fields.comment: A multiplier applied to attack_melee_impulse
fields.name: attack_melee_impulse_multiplier

fields.comment: Melee attack particle effects are created here
fields.name: attack_melee_offset_x

fields.comment: Melee attack particle effects are created here
fields.name: attack_melee_offset_y

fields.comment: If 1, we perform a finishing move when our attack would kill the target using the 'attack_finish' animation
fields.name: attack_melee_finish_enabled

fields.comment: If we have explosion, it's the setup for it
fields.name: attack_melee_finish_config_explosion

fields.comment: The animation frame during which the melee attack finishing move damage is inflicted and visual effects are created
fields.name: attack_melee_finish_action_frame

fields.comment: The maximum distance from enemy at which we can perform a dash attack. If a normal melee attack is possible we always do that instead
fields.name: attack_dash_distance

fields.comment: The minimum number of frames we wait between dash attacks
fields.name: attack_dash_frames_between

fields.comment: The amount of damage inflicted by the dash attack
fields.name: attack_dash_damage

fields.comment: The speed at which we dash
fields.name: attack_dash_speed

fields.comment: The smaller this value is the more curved our dash attack trajectory is
fields.name: attack_dash_lob

fields.comment: The minimum distance from enemy at which we can perform a ranged attack.
fields.name: attack_ranged_min_distance

fields.comment: The maximum distance from enemy at which we can perform a ranged attack.
fields.name: attack_ranged_max_distance

fields.comment: The frame of the 'attack_ranged' animation during which the ranged attack actually occurs
fields.name: attack_ranged_action_frame

fields.comment: The minimum number of frames we wait between ranged attacks
fields.name: attack_ranged_frames_between

fields.comment: 'attack_ranged_entity_file' is created here when performing a ranged attack
fields.name: attack_ranged_offset_x

fields.comment: 'attack_ranged_entity_file' is created here when performing a ranged attack
fields.name: attack_ranged_offset_y

fields.comment: If 1, we do ranged attacks by sending a Message_UseItem
fields.name: attack_ranged_use_message

fields.comment: If 1, we attempt to predict target movement and shoot accordingly
fields.name: attack_ranged_predict

fields.comment: File to projectile entity that is created when performing a ranged attack
fields.name: attack_ranged_entity_file

fields.comment: Minimum number of projectiles shot when performing a ranged attack
fields.name: attack_ranged_entity_count_min

fields.comment: Maximum number of projectiles shot when performing a ranged attack
fields.name: attack_ranged_entity_count_max

fields.comment: If 1, we draw a laser sight to our target. Requires entity to have a sprite with tag 'laser_sight'
fields.name: attack_ranged_use_laser_sight

fields.comment: 0 = red, 1 = blue
fields.name: attack_ranged_laser_sight_beam_kind

fields.comment: How long do we stay in the attack state, before other states are allowed?
fields.name: attack_ranged_state_duration_frames

fields.comment: If 1, we attempt to hide from our target after a succesful attack
fields.name: hide_from_prey

fields.comment: The minimum distance from our target where we should move when hiding
fields.name: hide_from_prey_target_distance

fields.comment: The number of frames we spend hiding and staying hiding
fields.name: hide_from_prey_time

fields.comment: The cell material we eat if encountering said material and 'needs_food' is 1
fields.name: food_material

fields.comment: We create particles made of this material when eating if 'food_eating_create_particles' is 1
fields.name: food_particle_effect_material

fields.comment: If 1, we replace eaten cells with particles made of this material
fields.name: food_eating_create_particles

fields.comment: 1/2 width of the area from which we eat food
fields.name: eating_area_radius_x

fields.comment: 1/2 height of the area from which we eat food
fields.name: eating_area_radius_y

fields.comment: The center of the area from which we eat food
fields.name: mouth_offset_x

fields.comment: The center of the area from which we eat food
fields.name: mouth_offset_y

fields.comment: If 1, we occasionally take a leak or a dump
fields.name: defecates_and_pees

fields.comment: Bodily wastes are created here
fields.name: butt_offset_x

fields.comment: Bodily wastes are created here
fields.name: butt_offset_y

fields.comment: The velocity at which our piss gets shot
fields.name: pee_velocity_x

fields.comment: The velocity at which our piss gets shot
fields.name: pee_velocity_y

fields.comment: If 1, we stop to eat if we encounter 'food_material' cells
fields.name: needs_food

fields.comment: If 1, we occasionally search our surroundings for prey and threats
fields.name: sense_creatures

fields.comment: If 1, will see creatures even if the wall raycast fails
fields.name: sense_creatures_through_walls

fields.comment: If 1, we can fly. Please set 'PathFindingComponent.can_fly' to 1 as well if this is 1
fields.name: can_fly

fields.comment: If 1, we can walk. Please set 'PathFindingComponent.can_walk' to 1 as well if this is 1
fields.name: can_walk

fields.comment: If we're further than this from target path finding node on the X-axis we turn to face it
fields.name: path_distance_to_target_node_to_turn_around

fields.comment: If we get stuck on ground we create an explosion this big to clear our surroundings a bit
fields.name: path_cleanup_explosion_radius

fields.comment: a stack of actions and times they take, we can push new actions to the front and pop them from there
fields.name: mAiStateStack

fields.comment: when was the last time we switched a state
fields.name: mAiStateLastSwitchFrame

fields.comment: previous AI state
fields.name: mAiStatePrev

fields.comment: threat/prey check, next time we check for threat/prey
fields.name: mCreatureDetectionNextCheck

fields.comment: the entity we consider to be our greatest threat
fields.name: mGreatestThreat

fields.comment: the entity we consider to be our most important prey
fields.name: mGreatestPrey

fields.comment: which AIAttackComponent attack are we using?
fields.name: mSelectedMultiAttack

fields.comment: 1, if we have ever found prey
fields.name: mHasFoundPrey

fields.comment: 1, if we have been ever attacked
fields.name: mHasBeenAttackedByPlayer

fields.comment: 1, if we have ever started attacking anyone
fields.name: mHasStartedAttacking

fields.comment: amount of 'food_material' near us
fields.name: mNearbyFoodCount

fields.comment: next frame we can eat
fields.name: mEatNextFrame

fields.comment: time we've been constantly eating
fields.name: mEatTime

fields.comment: next frame we consider ourselves to be stuck
fields.name: mFrameNextGiveUp

fields.comment: AABB min of the area where we've been since the last time we got stuck
fields.name: mLastFramesMovementAreaMin

fields.comment: AABB max of the area where we've been since the last time we got stuck
fields.name: mLastFramesMovementAreaMax

fields.comment: cached id of 'food_material'
fields.name: mFoodMaterialId

fields.comment: cached id of 'food_particle_effect_material'
fields.name: mFoodParticleEffectMaterialId

fields.comment: the greater this value the more likely we're to attack creatures from other herds
fields.name: mAggression

fields.comment: we use this for next jump
fields.name: mNextJumpLob

fields.comment: we use this for next jump
fields.name: mNextJumpTarget

fields.comment: we use this for next jump
fields.name: mNextJumpHasVelocity

fields.comment: previous frame we launched into a jump
fields.name: mLastFrameJumped

fields.comment: where our home is located
fields.name: mHomePosition

fields.comment: when was the last time we did an attack (not necessarily did damage to anyone though)
fields.name: mLastFrameAttackWasDone

fields.comment: if 1, we have noticed player or player projectile
fields.name: mHasNoticedPlayer

fields.comment: which direction does our gun currently point at, physically saying?
fields.name: mRangedAttackCurrentAimAngle

fields.comment: next frame we can perform a ranged attack
fields.name: mRangedAttackNextFrame

fields.comment: next frame we can perform a melee attack
fields.name: mMeleeAttackNextFrame

fields.comment: the amount of damage our next melee attack will cause. used by finishing move logic
fields.name: mNextMeleeAttackDamage

fields.comment: 1, if we're doing a melee attack
fields.name: mMeleeAttacking

fields.comment: the next frame we can perform a melee attack
fields.name: mMeleeAttackDashNextFrame

fields.comment: info about our current job. sorta legacy and could be simplified because the RTS logic is not used anywhere but doesn't have much overhead either.
fields.name: mCurrentJob
